pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Model with Tree-Based Lasso Regularization for Rare Features // Implementation of an alternating direction method of multipliers algorithm for fitting a linear model with tree- based lasso regularization, which is proposed in Algorithm 1 of Yan and Bien (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1796677. The package allows efficient model fitting on the entire 2-dimensional regularization path for large datasets. The complete set of functions also makes the entire process of tuning regularization parameters and visualizing results hassle-free.
